channel.title: shops[Delta]
channel.description:
Dear moparscapers,
I want to open a shop while i'm in a dialogue. So the npc you talk to gives you 3 options, yes please, oh no , and an other. I want to make that the first one makes you open the shop. someone know how to make this work?
pic:
[IMG]http://i54.tinypic.com/2v9f96w.jpg[/img]
thanks in advance, halflive9

item.title: shops[Delta]
item.dc:creator: @r0m3r0 r0m3r0
item.description:
@r0m3r0 wrote:

[quote=“I am beast, post:4, topic:414856”][quote author=r0m3r0 link=topic=516818.msg3754255#msg3754255 date=1316298005]
srry bout being late on answerin if its delta keep reading if not ignore ok heres how i did mine only mines opened bank buts its same thing:

go to clicking most nd find case 9157:
then instert this in it
if(c.NpcDialogue == 2) {
c.NpcDialogue = 3;
c.NpcDialogueSend = false;
}
change the 2 to the case id of the dialogue that says the options nd the 3 to the next case case id (make a new one nd change the 3 to the new one)

k now thats done go into client java nd make a player talk thingy this:

			playertalk("I'd like to access my ", "bank account");
			openwanneshop 1();
            break;

the dialogue can be anythin it wont show up itll just open the shop change wanneshop to ur shop id

hope i helped if its needs to explained better just ask(:
tell meh if this helped(:
[/quote]

Please learn to use the [ code] feature?[/quote]
dude yea i know but im new at righting code for people sorry but im trying(:
tryed to make it easy to understand by the color

Read full topic
